summary: Gundam is a popular Japanese science fiction franchise with giant robots called "Gundams." It started as a TV show in 1979 and created a new genre called "real robot" anime. The franchise includes many TV shows, movies, and games, and even inspired a real-life academic institution. Gundam is known for its cool plastic model kits, called Gunpla, which are very popular in Japan. The franchise is owned by Bandai Namco and has made a lot of money, with over $5 billion in sales by the year 2000.
title: Gundam
